cz.apolicky.summercampapp

Class SelectConfigurationAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • cz.apolicky.summercampapp.SelectConfigurationAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class SelectConfigurationAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
    An adapter that lists downloaded and online configurations. If a configuration is online and downloaded, lists it only in downloaded
